name: Virtual Escape: The Play Room
description: Find a way to escape the room, and unravel a strange story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 3570K, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
